Install Guide
==============================================================================

You need to get your MythTV box creating mp4 files. I followed this guide:
http://mythtv.org/wiki/index.php/Streaming_to_iPod_touch_or_iPhone

The script did not work for me. My MythTV is passing only one argument to the script and the script is expecting two. I will post my version of the script up here soon.
